forGmOnly.name: Show module to all users
forGmOnly.hint: Turn off to have module only be visible to GMs

rulesElementArrayLengthOnly.name: Simplified Rule Element discovery
rulesElementArrayLengthOnly.hint: Performs RE comparisons using array length. This gives fewer false positives, but also misses more true positives

propertyIgnoreList.name: Ignored Item properties
propertyIgnoreList.hint: Insert text separated by commas (,).  Each of these Item Properties will be ignored when finding items. E.g. publication,icon-link

revitalize.name: Allow Refreshing using backup solution
revitalize.hint: This will only be possible if the built-in Refresh is not available. It will only update certain properties, where it is safe to do

showSheetButtonNPC.name: Show Revitalize Icon in the NPC Sheet
showSheetButtonNPC.hint: Shows a clickable button in the top bar of NPC Sheets. Note that refreshing NPC Items is not recommended

sheet.check_actor_items_tooltip: Check for new versions of this Actor's Items using {name}

buttons.refresh: Refresh entire object from Compendium using PF2e built-in method
buttons.refresh_not_available: Not available on this Item (Rule Element or Bestiary Item Source prevents Refresh)
buttons.refresh_not_available_hint: . Recreate Item, or check the module settings for potential backup Refresh option
buttons.revitalize: Not possible to Refresh whole item. Click to update the following properties:
buttons.hide: Hide this Item in the future

popup.error_find_uuid: Something went wrong with finding the UUID or the sourceId
popup.error_revitalize_property: Something went wrong with revitalizing the property {property}
popup.reload: Don't forget to Reload Application to clear Companion data from memory
popup.will_not_rename: Will not rename {name} as it contains vital information

unrevitalizable.revitalize_will_not_recreate: Revitalize will not recreate remaining properties
unrevitalizable.bestiary_warning: Bestiary abilities sometimes have purposeful changes from Compendium. Only change if you know what you are doing

footer.important_property_legend: *property which may prevent certain refresh options

selection.select_actors_title: Select which Actors you want to run the check on
